Package org.moddingx.launcherlib.util

Interface Either<A,B>

All Known Implementing Classes:
Either.Left, Either.Right
public sealed interface Either<A,B> permits Either.Left<A>, Either.Right<B>
An Either is always either an instance of Either.Left or Either.Right effectively giving a union type of two other types.

    • tryWith

      static <T> Either<T,RuntimeException> tryWith(Supplier<T> action)
      Executes the given Supplier and returns a Either.Left with the result. If the supplier throws an exception, returns a Either.Right containing that exception.
